StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_DBAUpdateCLScore]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@mc_id int, @version varchar(3), @cl_score int AS
if @mc_id<>NULL and @version<>NULL and @cl_score<>NULL begin update candidate_asvab set user_login=le.(SUSER_SNAME(),15), update_date=getdate(), cl_score=@cl_score where marine_candidate_id=@mc_id and version=@version end else begin print 'You must enter NON-NULL values for marine_id, version and cl_score' end
